verses.text: \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w feedeth|strong="H7462"\w* on \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, and \w followeth|strong="H7291"\w* after the east \w wind|strong="H6921"\w*: he \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* \w increaseth|strong="H7235"\w* \w lies|strong="H3577"\w* and \w desolation|strong="H7701"\w*; and they do \w make|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with the \w Assyrians|strong="H0804"\w*, and \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* is \w carried|strong="H2986"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath also a \w controversy|strong="H7379"\w* with \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and will \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* according to his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*; according to his \w doings|strong="H4611"\w* will he \w recompense|strong="H7725"\w* him.\f + \fr 12.2 \ft punish: Heb. visit upon\f*

¶ He took his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* by the \w heel|strong="H6117"\w* in the \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*, and by his \w strength|strong="H0202"\w* he had \w power|strong="H8280"\w* with \w God|strong="H0430"\w*:\f + \fr 12.3 \ft had…: Heb. was a prince, or, behaved himself princely\f*

Yea, he had \w power|strong="H7786"\w* over the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w*, and \w prevailed|strong="H3201"\w*: he \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*, and made \w supplication|strong="H2603"\w* unto him: he \w found|strong="H4672"\w* him \add in\add* \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*, and there he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* with us;

Even the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* his \w memorial|strong="H2143"\w*.

Therefore \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* thou to thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* and \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w wait|strong="H6960"\w* on thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*.

¶ \add He is\add* a \w merchant|strong="H3667"\w*, the \w balances|strong="H3976"\w* of \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w* \add are\add* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: he \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* to \w oppress|strong="H6231"\w*.\f + \fr 12.7 \ft a merchant: or, Canaan\f*\f + \fr 12.7 \ft oppress: or, deceive\f*

And \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Yet I am become \w rich|strong="H6238"\w*, I have found me \w out|strong="H4672"\w* \w substance|strong="H0202"\w*: \add in\add* all my \w labours|strong="H3018"\w* they shall \w find|strong="H4672"\w* none \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* in me that \add were\add* \w sin|strong="H2399"\w*.\f + \fr 12.8 \ft in all…: or, all my labours suffice me not: he shall have punishment of iniquity in whom is sin\f*\f + \fr 12.8 \ft that: Heb. which\f*

And I \add that am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* from the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* will yet make thee to \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in \w tabernacles|strong="H0168"\w*, as in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of the solemn \w feast|strong="H4150"\w*.

I have also \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* by the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, and I have \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* \w visions|strong="H2377"\w*, and used \w similitudes|strong="H1819"\w*, by the \w ministry|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*.\f + \fr 12.10 \ft ministry: Heb. hand\f*

\add Is there\add* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w* \add in\add* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*? surely they are \w vanity|strong="H7723"\w*: they \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H7794"\w* in \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*; yea, their \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* \add are\add* as \w heaps|strong="H1530"\w* in the \w furrows|strong="H8525"\w* of the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*.

And \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* into the \w country|strong="H7704"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*, and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* for a \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, and for a \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* he \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \add sheep\add*.

And by a \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and by a \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* was he \w preserved|strong="H8104"\w*.

\w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* provoked \add him\add* to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* most \w bitterly|strong="H8563"\w*: therefore shall he \w leave|strong="H5203"\w* his \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* upon him, and his \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* shall his \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto him.\f + \fr 12.14 \ft most…: Heb. with bitternesses\f*\f + \fr 12.14 \ft blood: Heb. bloods\f*
